A New Look

A dim room, Raskolnikov and his brother.  
Excitement fills the air.  
Brother: “This is something special for you!”  

Raskolnikov: “Presently, afterwards.”  
Brother: “Come on, don’t oppose! It’s just your size!”  

---
A worn cap in his hands, Raskolnikov sighs.  
Brother: “A proper head-covering is essential!”  
Nastasya: “Twenty copecks, no more?”  

Brother: “Silly! It’s eighty copecks!”  
Raskolnikov: “What a waste...”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin is excited to show Raskolnikov a new cap he bought for him, emphasizing the importance of proper dress.
